name: Monick Halm
who_you_serve: Women who are successful and capable, seeking deeper connections and a more playful relationship with wealth and life.
what_you_do: Monick Halm offers luxury retreats designed to help successful women reconnect with joy, ease, and their relationship with wealth.
current_projects: Nominations for the 2025 Women of Influence will open in January 2025.
